name: SedentaryBehavior
title: Sedentary Behavior
description: High duration/ frequency of the person's sedentary time (Business ID: Entry 2200728)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Sedentary Behavior.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an high duration/ frequency of the person's sedentary time.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes GROUP codes for Sedentary Behavior.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Sedentary Behavior.)
